title: FRQ Score
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples and to score the response.

General Considerations:

For Task A, the response must correctly define proportional representation.

For Task B, the response must correctly describe proportional representation in two different AP Comparative Government and Politics course countries.

For Task C, the response must correctly explain how proportional representation affects party systems for each of the two AP Comparative Government and Politics course countries described in Task (B).
descriptions: The response accomplishes none of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes one of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes two of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes three of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes four of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes all five of the tasks set by the question.
